title: 8/12/2017 - Infinite Loop Patching Issue
body:
Good morning everyone,

A lot of players are reporting patching failure issues this morning.  Error messages might include unspecified errors or an error patching.  I've forwarded the details to interested parties, and our technicians are investigating the problem. 


> **UPDATE @ 1:00pm PT** This issue should now be resolved!  If you still have any issues with this, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help you directly!

---

> **UPDATE @ 10:53am PT** In some cases, [reconfiguring your DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) may resolve the issue for some players.  

---

> **UPDATE @ 10:40am PT**: I've seen a few players suggest a workaround by setting their OS clock back 24 hours.  **Do this at your own risk, and do not play ranked.  Loss prevention is not active, and you can still receive Leaverbuster penalties.  **Your Windows clock is crucial to a lot of features to both your OS and as well as League, and changing that can cause other unforseen problems.

We've also updated our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, and a fix is being worked on!   I'll keep this post updated with info as they come.  Hang tight, friends!

replies.body: When I follow this suggestion, it sticks on "1 file scanned" and stays at 33%. Will wait for further info. Thanks for looking into this promptly!
Thanks for the info here.  I've removed the current manual work around since it's still causing issues, but I'll keep my eyes open for an update.
Moved my pc clock back 24 hours and the client works.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
I've seen a few players who have suggested this workaround.  I've passed this tip to look into it, thanks!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ULqT01gG,comment-id=0004000100010000,timestamp=2017-08-12T17:36:14.916+0000)
>
> I've seen a few players who have suggested this workaround.  I've passed this tip to look into it, thanks!

Why is loss forgiven not on and ranked down while this is happening?

i did your manual fix and then changed my region when i was stuck at 33% to Brazil and then back to na and now i can get into the client
http://imgur.com/a/apSiW
I did uninstalled the client and re downloaded it from the official website. Got greeted with [this](http://i.imgur.com/a/FXSSc) after install. Hope you guys can resolve this issue.

I have a similar popup but it wont even open the client, and got [**THIS**](https://i.gyazo.com/ffc04deaf486879c1c98e9ae356db30d.png) lovely popup every time. i also tried restarting my computer and I'm running on windows 10, any fixes for it yet?

This is an unrelated issue, but I can help!  This specific error can happen when your settings are preventing your game files from being read.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should restore access and get the client up!
I did the same thing, and got the same error at the same point in the installation. At least it's consistent.

Not sure having people break their client based on one report that it worked is a good idea.

http://i.imgur.com/H6F2yHP.png

Stuck calculating differences for 10 minutes.
WHEN ITS STACK AT 1% TURN UR CLOCK BACK 24HRS THEN WHEN IT GETS STACK AT 33% CHANGE REGION AT TURKEY AND THEN AFTER 1MIN CHANGE TO UR ORIGINAL AND IT STARTS MOVING AGAIN IM CURRENTLY AT 35%

Is it all 100% fixed now? Asking before I try playing.

Did Riot get a new hamster to run the servers?
The changed the Hamster with a wild Teemo
NICE

An out of sync Windows clock can definitely cause weird issues sometimes, but it would be a really strange situation since so many players are impacted currently.  If it works for you, though, let me know!

-- Be super careful about doing this.  If changing your clock works, you may actually end up with other unforeseen issues with your OS as well as getting into a game.
i can confirm this works. probably shouldn't be the fix though XD
i set mine back to 12:20 am, 12 hours ago and i logged in just fine, but changing it back to correct time forces it to loop again

Interesting. That must mean its a bug in whatever patch they had set to send out today.

Which means the quick fix is easy. Pull back the patch, have people restart their client, then dig through the patch to see what went wrong.
It also worked for me, just set the date to August 11
Bought $40 worth of RP to do the dungeon pass and cannot even log in now. This is my one day off this week and now I am out 40 bucks and cant play. GG Rito
Whatever you did Riot, it worked. Thanks for fixing the issue!

getting the issue on PBE as well

http://puu.sh/x8lRN/99f378d25b.png
Setting the clock on your computer back 12 hours works. I just tried it. Pass it on.

Set my pc 1 day back and pass the caps of 33%. was able to lauch client will reboot pc then try on the right date
For now everhting is workling
it sticks on "1 file scanned" and stays at 33%
did this get fixed? i tried reinstalling but it didn't help

For some reason my download gets to a certain point and when it says “applying patches” it stops, the L icon in the top left with the download number fades sorta and it starts the download all over again. Any idea how to fix?

Thanks for the advice! I never post on threads but turning clock back 24 hours fixed it....

Not sure how, but it worked. I've just switched the clock back 24 hours ahead .

when i try to log in into my account, i keep crashing and the client reboots while the bugsplat keeps coming up when it crashes
so i just keep getting a infinite amount of bugsplats until the point i have to restart my computer, this never happened to me before and I tried the hextech repair tool but it still doesnt work

**[100% Fixed]**

Okay so it seems I have actually found a fix to this issue myself! If you are on Windows 10 all you have to do is revert to your last version of windows and it will allow you to update. After that you can reinstall the latest windows 10 update and everything will work as it did before!

Here is my log, I tried uninstalling and reinstalling but that didn't work please help Riot!

Still having this issue what should I do?!
I had this happen yesterday so I did the clock changing and forgot to change it back{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Aw.... I thought it was just me so i reseted my pc.............. 
Should've waited, feelsbadman {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Im still stuck in the cycle of "LoL was set back to an older patch" "Patching error" and restart.
I tried reinstalling, i tried changing the DNS settings nothing works.

When the problem first came out I uninstalled and reinstalled, like many others. Ive run the install file and launcher as admin but whenever I launch from the orange client the new client does not appear.

I've tried setting UAC to never as well, but am unable to update windows tbh.

Since this wasnt a problem this morning I hoped it wouldn't continue to be one.

Thanks,

tree

Changing date/time did not work.

Guess i cant play till Riot fixes their junk.
4 YEARS LATER SITTING AT 70%
the good old ipconfig /flushdns worked for me on EUW

You can Windows Key + R and type cmd, then type "ipconfig flushdns". That worked for me as the problem was fixed then it appeared again, I don't know if somebody already suggested this but it might help.

> [{quoted}](name=Chromarty,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ULqT01gG,comment-id=0034,timestamp=2017-08-12T18:47:36.017+0000)
>
> You can Windows Key + R and type cmd, then type "ipconfig flushdns". That worked for me as the problem was fixed then it appeared again, I don't know if somebody already suggested this but it might help.

^^this...it worked for me....idk what riot did to cause this kinda problem..but this person has saved me..if you are having the problems still..do this^^^^it works. at least for me..thank you good ...person..helicopter..dinosaur..what ever you are xD{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Hit repair client and it will scan all the files.  After that should work.
hextech repair tool doesn't work for me

hmm
http://imgur.com/a/Calx1
Still having the infinite loop with " Restored previous installation " then going to " there was a problem patching league " and so on.
I'm almost certain it's because a SSL certificate has expired.
Would be shame for multiplayer game company like riot not keeping track of it...{{item:3694}}
